Name: Corner the Market
Rules Text: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.

Name: Develop Weaponry
Rules Text: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies.

Name: Diversify Research
Rules Text: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.

Name: Erect a Monument
Rules Text: Spend 8 resources.

Name: Expand Borders
Rules Text: Control 6 planets in non-home systems.

Name: Found Research Outposts
Rules Text: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties.

Name: Intimidate Council
Rules Text: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's system.

Name: Lead From the Front
Rules Text: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

Name: Negotiate Trade Routes
Rules Text: Spend 5 trade goods.

Name: Sway the Council
Rules Text: Spend 8 influence.

Name: Amass Wealth
Rules Text: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources, and 3 trade goods.

Name: Build Defenses
Rules Text: Have 4 or more structures.

Name: Discover Lost Outposts
Rules Text: Control 2 planets that have attachments.

Name: Engineer a Marvel
Rules Text: Have your flagship or a war sun on the board.

Name: Explore Deep Space
Rules Text: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

Name: Improve Infrastructure
Rules Text: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.

Name: Make History
Rules Text: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

Name: Populate the Outer Rim
Rules Text: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

Name: Push Boundaries
Rules Text: Control more planets that each of 2 of your neighbors.

Name: Raise a Fleet
Rules Text: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

Name: Centralize Galactic Trade
Rules Text: Spend 10 trade goods.

Name: Conquer the Weak
Rules Text: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system.

Name: Form Galactic Brain Trust
Rules Text: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties.

Name: Found a Golden Age
Rules Text: Spend 16 resources.

Name: Galvanize the People
Rules Text: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

Name: Manipulate Galactic Law
Rules Text: Spend 16 influence.

Name: Master the Sciences
Rules Text: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.

Name: Revolutionize Warfare
Rules Text: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies.

Name: Subdue the Galaxy
Rules Text: Control 11 planets in non-home systems.

Name: Unify the Colonies
Rules Text: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.

Name: Achieve Supremacy
Rules Text: Have your flagship or war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.

Name: Become a Legend
Rules Text: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

Name: Command an Armada
Rules Text: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

Name: Construct Massive Cities
Rules Text: Have 7 or more structures.

Name: Control the Borderlands
Rules Text: Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

Name: Hold Vast Reserves
Rules Text: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources, and 6 trade goods.

Name: Patrol Vast Territories
Rules Text: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.

Name: Protect the Border
Rules Text: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.

Name: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
Rules Text: Control 3 planets that have attachments.

Name: Rule Distant Lands
Rules Text: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system.

Name: Adapt New Strategies
Rules Text: Own 2 faction technologies. "Valefar Assimilator" technologies do not count toward this objective.

Name: Become the Gatekeeper
Rules Text: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole.

Name: Control the Region
Rules Text: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.

Name: Cut Supply Lines
Rules Text: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.

Name: Destroy their Greatest Ship
Rules Text: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.

Name: Establish a Perimeter
Rules Text: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

Name: Forge an Alliance
Rules Text: Control 4 cultural planets.

Name: Form a Spy Network
Rules Text: Discard 5 action cards.

Name: Fuel the War Machine
Rules Text: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

Name: Gather a Mighty Fleet
Rules Text: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board.

Name: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
Rules Text: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.

Name: Make an Example of their World
Rules Text: Use Bombardment to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet.

Name: Master the Laws of Physics
Rules Text: Own 4 technologies of the same color.

Name: Mine Rare Minerals
Rules Text: Control 4 hazardous planets.

Name: Monopolize Production
Rules Text: Control 4 industrial planets.

Name: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
Rules Text: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.

Name: Spark a Rebellion
Rules Text: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points.

Name: Threaten Enemies
Rules Text: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.

Name: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
Rules Text: Use Space Cannon to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system.

Name: Unveil Flagship
Rules Text: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat.

Name: Become a Martyr
Rules Text: Lose control of a planet in a home system.

Name: Betray a Friend
Rules Text: Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action.

Name: Brave the Void
Rules Text: Win a combat in an anomaly.

Name: Darken the Skies
Rules Text: Win a combat in another player's home system.

Name: Defy Space and Time
Rules Text: Have units in the wormhole nexus.

Name: Demonstrate Your Power
Rules Text: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

Name: Destroy Heretical Works
Rules Text: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.

Name: Dictate Policy
Rules Text: There are 3 or more laws in play.

Name: Drive the Debate
Rules Text: You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.

Name: Establish Hegemony
Rules Text: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.

Name: Fight with Precision
Rules Text: Use Anti-Fighter Barrage to destroy the last of a player's fighters in a system.

Name: Foster Cohesion
Rules Text: Be neighbors with all other players.

Name: Hoard Raw Materials
Rules Text: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

Name: Mechanize the Military
Rules Text: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.

Name: Occupy the Fringe
Rules Text: Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.

Name: Produce en Masse
Rules Text: Have units with a combined Production value of at least 8 in a single system.

Name: Prove Endurance
Rules Text: Be the last player to pass during a game round.

Name: Seize an Icon
Rules Text: Control a legendary planet.

Name: Stake Your Claim
Rules Text: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

Name: Strengthen Bonds
Rules Text: Have another player's promissory note in your play area.
